---
category: news
title: "A 40nm 1Mb 35.6 TOPS/W MLC NOR-Flash based Computation-in-Memory Structure for Machine Learning"
excerpt: "Computation-in-memory (CIM) is a feasible method to overcome \"Von-Neumann bottleneck\" with high throughput and energy efficiency. In this paper, we proposed a 1Mb Multi-Level (MLC) NOR Flash based CIM (MLFlash-CIM) structure with 40nm technology node."
